name: Magdh
content:
Magdh

The Three

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 28
Pathfinder Wiki Magdh

Details

Alignment LN
Pantheon Eldest
Areas of Concern Complexity, fate, triplets
Domains Knowledge, Law, Luck, Rune
Subdomains Curse, Fate, Thought, Wards
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Scythe
Symbol Green three-pointed knot
Sacred Animal(s) Multi-headed animals
Sacred Color(s) Blue, green

Obedience

Paint two dots above each ear to represent Magdh's three sets of eyes. Cast leaves, bones, or coins into a bowl of clear water, and attempt to divine meaning from the way they land. You gain a +4 bonus on Intelligence-based skill checks.

Boons - Fey Obedience

Feysworn

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 28
1: Secret Knowledge (Sp) identify 3/day, augury 2/day, or clairaudience/clairvoyance 1/day
2: Sight Beyond Time (Su) You constantly see a few moments down your own line of fate, and thus are never surprised or flat-footed. In addition, you gain a +2 insight bonus to AC and on Reflex saves.
3: Baleful Revelation (Sp) You can cast prediction of failureUM once per day.

For Followers of Magdh

Archetypes

Nornkith (Monk)

Feats

Fey Friend

Magic Items - Rods

Rod of the Thriceborn (normal)

Magic Items - Wondrous Items

Charm of the Thriceborn, Ribbon of the Three

Spells

Threefold Face, Threefold Form, Threefold Sight

Traits

Shaper of Reality

Unique Spell Rules

Source Legacy of the First World pg. 25

Cleric/Warpriest

Threefold Aspect can be prepared as a 4th-level spell
Threefold Face can be prepared as a 3rd-level spell
Threefold Sight can be prepared as a 3rd-level spell
Moment of Prescience can be prepared as a 8th-level spell
